snippet: The sergeant is being attacked in the absence of actual facts.
abstract: Editorial contends criticism from Republican Party about exchange of five Taliban leaders for release of Sgt Bowe Bergdahl have made clear that there is no action Obama administration can take that cannot be used for political purposes by his opponents; maintains outrageous demonization of Bergdahl is occurring in the absence of actual facts.
lead_paragraph: The sergeant is being attacked in the absence of actual facts.
